#summary Installation under Windows
#labels Phase-Implementation,Featured,Phase-Deploy
= StartOS Install =



     No need to perform formatting NAND Flash.

 On your DVD shipped with mini2440 board or in Archive STARTOS.rar
 there is DNW.exe utility for Windows (XP or 7).

 1. Turn off mini2440 power.

 2. Connect USB cable and COM cable to Board simultaneously.

 3. Move switch S2 in NOR position.

 4. Run DNW.exe on Desktop or Notebook/Netbook.

 5. Turn on Power by S1.

 6. On DNW window in Configuration Option Check: COM Port Number (1),115200 kBod, and address 0x33d00000 (0x30000000 is suitable too, anyway program will copy itself onto 0x33D00000 address).

 7. On DNW in Left Upper corner {Serial Port} Press Connect. Now your Computer plays terminal role.

 8. Press {Enter} (for List of commands) or {d} (for SDRAM load&start)  on Desktop Computer Keyboard.

 9. On {USB Port} select Transmit/Restore.

10. Find and point to StartOS.bin.

11. Program must start immediately.

12. Your old system in NAND Flash stays unchanged.

   Then if everything is Ok you may wish to perform {a} command, Switch S2 to NAND and work with StartOS. 

 Note: {d} - loads program into RAM, {a} - loads into ROM.
